settings.advanced: Use the advanced sort (each letter will be a heading)
settings.description: The frontmatter allows to use automatically the right commands based on the frontmatter. Conveniant when used with the linter plugin and other macros.
settings.disable: Disable the command (can be forced using other commands)
settings.level: Heading level for the advanced sort (1-6)
settings.reverse: Reverse the order of the sort (Z-A)
